title: Ticket #1223: move submit file commands back to condor_submit man page
description: Folks that use Condor really want the lengthy list of commands that can go into a submit description file to be in the condor_submit manual page, not just in the user manual (currently in section 2.5.1). So they are to be moved back into the man page, with a duplicate inclusion as section 2.5.1. One file to maintain, 2 inclusions within the manual.
remarks: In the end, went with 1 file, located with the man pages, and referenced only by the condor_submit manual page. Prose within the Users' Manual refers to the man page, and suggest using the Submit Commands index entry for lookup.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-17 14:49   Check-in [25288]: descriptions of submit commands moved to the condor_submit man page (gittrac #1223) (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
